metadata.title: CVE-2020-10958 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In Dovecot before 2.3.10.1, a crafted SMTP/LMTP message triggers anunauthenticated use-after-free bug in submission-login, submission, orlmtp, and can lead to a crash under circumstances involving many newlinesafter a command.

criterions.comment: dovecot: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
